AI Description: BLAST+ (Basic Local Alignment Search Tool) is a suite of tools for performing similarity searches of nucleotide and protein databases. It is widely used for comparing biological sequences to identify homologous sequences and infer functional and evolutionary relationships.
Core Features: Search Nucleotide & Protein Databases For Similarity, Identify Homologous Sequences, Infer Functional & Evolutionary Relationships, Highly Efficient Search Algorithms
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, Genomics, Sequence Analysis
